title: South Korea's SK Hynix to establish a special ‘AI Company’ in the U.S.
description: SK Hynix will set up a new U.S.-based company focused on artificial intelligence solutions, with $10 billion committed to the project.
content:
South Korean memory giant SK Hynix announced Wednesday that it will set up a new U.S.-based company focused on artificial intelligence solutions, committing at least $10 billion as it seizes on new AI growth engines.

title: China finally has some 'good news' for Nvidia as it 'allows' sale of H200 AI chips, but conditions apply for buyers
description: Tech News News: China has reportedly approved the import of its first batch of Nvidia's H200 artificial intelligence (AI) chips. This marks a major change in Beijing'.
content: China has greenlit its first import of Nvidia's powerful H200 AI chips, signaling a policy shift. This move aims to balance domestic AI development with fostering local chip production. The initial batch, reportedly hundreds of thousands, goes to maj... [3559 chars]

title: Italy's Cyber Shield: Defending the Winter Olympics from High-Tech Threats
description: Italy's National Cybersecurity Agency is gearing up to shield the Winter Olympics from cyberattacks. The event's global visibility makes it a prime target. The agency is prepared to tackle threats using artificial intelligence, with a focus on early detection and rapid response.
content:
Inside a modern government building across from Rome's Aurelian walls, Italy's National Cybersecurity Agency has been working tirelessly to protect the upcoming Milano Cortina Winter Olympics from potential cyberattacks.

title: How a high school English teacher banned AI from her classroom : NPR
description: Forth Worth teacher Chanea Bond says sticking with pen and paper keeps generative artificial intelligence out of her American literature classes.
content:
Stacks of worksheets sit atop desks and tables in Chanea Bond's Fort Worth classroom. Her students all have their own school-issued laptops, but Bond has swapped computers for paper — lots of paper.
